article.title: General Atomics to Support Italian MQ-9 Reaper
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Incorporated, Poway, California, is being awarded a $16,870,978 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for contractor logistics support for the Italian Air Force MQ-9 Reaper. Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air ForceÂ Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
